title: Georgia Senate runoff costs more than a Da Vinci's worth of TV ads
description: Back with a big number for the week, Carrie Dann tracks the historic ad spending underway in the two Georgia Senate runoffs.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
